alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 8:03PM MDT until June 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MDT MONDAY FOR PORTIONS OF CHERRY CREEK SOUTH OF PARKER... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including the following county, Douglas. * WHEN...Until 200 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding along Cherry Creek is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 803 PM MDT, Previous heavy rainfall from late this afternoon. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Cherry Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas south of Parker.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
